A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I was disappointed and cheated. Forty years of themes wiped away and ties cut to the previous movies to extend the life of the franchise with new actors and make more money. The levity was lame\, Snoke underdeveloped\, and a suddenly overpowering and commonplace Force unconvincing (why bother with light sabers?). My advise - watch it on a big screen TV at home when nothing else is on worth watching
